A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is my first review that I felt compelled to give for a movie online.As a longtime Star Wars fan since I was a kid I was surprised when I looked at the critics rating versus the audience rating before seeing the movie. Now I understand completely. The movie looked great but I left shocked and disappointed how I could leave that movie feeling so empty. There was no connection and love for the characters and no great script or story. I even found myself looking at my watch half way through. I wanted to love it but couldn’t talk myself into it. Maybe I’m just getting old or living in the past however I thought that the force awakens was great. I wonder what George Lucas is thinking.
